levels.description:
Fire a special bullet, dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of ATK as Physical damage and pushing the target back <@ba.vup>moderately</>. If target is defeated, the next reload loads <@ba.vup>{cnt}</> additional bullet(s)
<@ba.rem>Can store 1 charge</>

<@ba.rem>Can store 1 charge</>
